title: The Grouped Horseshoe distribution and its statistical properties
authors: Virginia X. He and Matt P. Wand
abstract:
The Grouped Horseshoe distribution arises from hierarchical structures in the
recent Bayesian methodological literature aimed at selection of groups of
regression coefficients. We isolate this distribution and study its properties
concerning Bayesian statistical inference. Most, but not all, of the properties
of the univariate Horseshoe distribution are seen to transfer to the grouped
case.
